name: chill
description: $chill is the first LSP7 token in existence. it was equally airdropped amongst the chillwhales community, the first LSP8 NFT project on the LUKSO blockchain. $chill plays a key role in not only the chill labs ecosystem; but also with LUKSO standard proposals through participation as a cultural currency, community & project based initiatives, as well as a reputation based system on-chain.
